GUI Module¶

class calibration_screen.CalibrationScreen(main_window: WindowManager)¶

Class representing the calibration screen.

Indicates whether it's the first time the screen is being displayed.

bool

set_calibration_screen()¶

Sets up the calibration screen.

class custom_button.CustomButton(title, width, height, font_size, parent=None)¶

CustomButton class inherits from QPushButton and implements a button widget with dynamic styles for different states.

title¶

The title text of the button.

Type:

str

width¶

The width of the button.

Type:

int

height¶

The height of the button.

Type:

int

font_size¶

The font size of the button text.

Type:

int

action_cancel()¶

Action performed when the button is clicked.

action_next()¶

Action performed when the button is clicked.

enterEvent(event)¶

Event handler for when the mouse enters the button.

hover_style()¶

Defines the CSS style for the hover state of the button.

Returns:

CSS style for the hover state.

Return type:

str

leaveEvent(event)¶

Event handler for when the mouse leaves the button.

mousePressEvent(event)¶

Event handler for mouse press event.

mouseReleaseEvent(event)¶

Event handler for mouse release event.

normal_style()¶

Defines the CSS style for the normal state of the button.

Returns:

CSS style for the normal state.

Return type:

str

pressed_style()¶

Defines the CSS style for the pressed state of the button.

Returns:

CSS style for the pressed state.

Return type:

str

class data_acquisition_screen.DataAcquisitionScreen(main_window: WindowManager, user_data: UserData)¶

DataAcquisitionScreen class manages the data acquisition process.

is_first_time¶

Flag indicating if it's the first time setting up the screen.

Type:

bool

duration_entry¶
Type:

QtWidgets.QLineEdit

Widget for entering the measurement duration.
data_acquisition_panel¶

Panel containing all widgets for data acquisition.

Type:

QtWidgets.QWidget

timer¶

Timer for tracking the measurement duration.

Type:

QtCore.QTimer

lapsed_time¶

Time elapsed since the start of measurement.

Type:

int

path_to_csv¶

Path to the CSV file for saving measurement data.

Type:

str

total_time¶

Total duration of the measurement in seconds.

Type:

int

field_error¶

Error message related to the duration field.

Type:

str

time_display¶

Widget for displaying the elapsed time.

Type:

QtWidgets.QLabel

time_to_reach_label¶

Widget for displaying the remaining time.

Type:

QtWidgets.QLabel

back_button¶

Button for navigating to the previous screen.

Type:

CustomButton

measurement_button¶

Button for starting/stopping/restarting the measurement.

Type:

CustomButton

next_button¶

Button for navigating to the next screen.

Type:

CustomButton

set_data_acquisition_screen()¶

Sets up the data acquisition screen.

class window_manager.WindowManager(ghd_logo_path, kore_logo_path, window_title, window_width, window_height, background, frontground, header_title, header_font)¶

Class to manage the main window of the application.

is_sensecom_layout¶

Flag to indicate whether the SenseCom layout is currently displayed.

Type:

bool

The path to the GHD logo image.

Type:

str

The path to the Kore logo image.

Type:

str

The title of the window.

Type:

str

window_width¶

The width of the window.

Type:

int

window_height¶

The height of the window.

Type:

int

background¶

The background color of the window.

Type:

str

frontground¶

The frontground color of the window.

Type:

str

header_title¶

The title displayed in the window header.

Type:

str

header_font¶

The font used for the header title.

Type:

QtGui.QFont

exe_manager¶

An instance of the ExeManager class.

Type:

ExeManager

add_button(button)¶

Add a button to the button layout.

Parameters:

button -- The button to add.

add_content_widget(widget)¶

Add a widget to the content layout.

Parameters:

widget -- The widget to add.

clear_buttons_layout()¶

Clear the buttons layout.

clear_sensecom_layout()¶

Clear the SenseCom layout.

closeEvent(event)¶

Handle the close event of the window.

close_sensecom_widget()¶

Close the SenseCom widget.

create_sensecom_widget()¶

Create the SenseCom widget.

show_content_widget(direction)¶

Show the next or previous content widget.

Parameters:

direction (str) -- The direction to navigate ('Next' or 'Back').

window_manager.window_proc(hwnd, msg, wparam, lparam)¶

Callback function to handle window messages.

Parameters:

  • hwnd (int) -- The handle to the window.

  • msg (int) -- The message identifier.

  • wparam (int) -- Additional message information.

  • lparam (int) -- Additional message information.

Returns:

The result of the message processing and the action taken.

Return type:

int
